website_summaries.verdict: Low-priced starter set aimed at young kids just picking up the game. Set includes three clubs.
pros: Set includes a driver, iron, putter, and a bag with red accents
Very low price versus some other starter sets for pre-teens
Irons have a wide sole to make it easier to achieve a successful ball strike
cons: Limited to 1 iron in this set

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by how nice this set is. The clubs look and feel just like a small version of grandpa's real PING set (I'm grandpa), with a very "pro" looking mallet putter too. The bag is more than adequate for my little guy to carry around as we practice together. These are a good value if you have a little one that wants to go the range with you. Bring some wiffle or foam balls along for them to start with, and you're all set.
customer_reviews.author: ZipKelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought these clubs for my granddaughter who is 3 and very interested in golf. The set is pretty nice, and has enough for a budding golfer. They look like a set of golf clubs instead of cheap plastic ones and are indeed golf clubs for beginners. They will last her a couple of years. The bag is the weak link, but we can live with that. Price is good too, as we spent time looking around. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Canuck

customer_reviews.title: Nice little clubs.
customer_reviews.text: These little clubs are perfect. The only feedback I have is that it would have been much better if the golf bag had some way of standing up. A stand would have been the cherry on top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon junkie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for strong littles!
customer_reviews.text: My son found my clubs and started swinging away. After 2 days and many many cringes as he banged my clubs on the ground, I started looking for clubs of his own. He’s younger but about the size of a 3 year old and I thought the plastic beginner sets wouldn’t survive his surprisingly strong swing (and I was worried about the dogs chewing them). Although it was hard to pay more money, it was well worth it. They are a great set and have survived a strong little boy, his dogs, his older siblings and a nice in the rain. I’d buy them again... and honestly probably will.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old son who loves golf. He had two sets of plastic golf clubs that he would break pretty easily. This seemed like the next best option. He loves them! They are heavy, so my husband has to carry them--not light weight! But he can use them easily and "play" golf. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amethystgoddess

customer_reviews.title: No shoulder strap connection
customer_reviews.text: Great little clubs but the bag has no shoulder strap connection! Top has a D-ring but there isn't anything below to connect to so it's worthless. I've tried to contact the seller but I've not had any luck getting any response. No way to carry the bag and no support system for the bag to stay upright.
customer_reviews.author: M Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good clubs!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my three year old for Christmas. He loves them and they are a very good size for him! However, my husband thinks they are a little bit on the heavy side and could be lighter for his age. We kept them because they are good beginner clubs!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Grand Nephew loves it, and uses it daily to practice during lock down. It is an excellent beginner set, and very light weight important for kids to be able to carry while they learn.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Great golf set
customer_reviews.text: We are introducing our 2 and 4 year-old grandsons to the game of golf. The clubs are the perfect size and weight. They were both very excited to have "real" clubs to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Great for 4 yrs old
customer_reviews.text: Great set for my 4 year old, not to expensive so if he loses intrest I'm out alot but yet a nice quality set of clubs vs the cheap plastic toy ones
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Enoch

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs for a kid!
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday gift for our 5 year old grandson. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dlynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality clubs for kids. I'd prefer a bag that stood up.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The driver was broken in half and the head smashed when it arrived
customer_reviews.author: Hope P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Kid Set
customer_reviews.text: My Son (4 years old) loves these clubs. They fit him perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old great grandson lived this. Lightweight and easy fir him to use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginners set for my 5 year old. The only think I would change is the shoulder strap. But other than that my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sim.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 year old grandson. He carries them around all the time. He would like to go to the course every day. Lol.well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: dee dawkins

customer_reviews.title: Quality starter
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the quality of this set. Great starter set for little golfers.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Ella loves to play golf!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the golf clubs to get my granddaughter interested in golf
customer_reviews.author: Ann T. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Good Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Good clubs my son has been hitting them pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 2.5 year old, he is 37.5 in tall. They are a great size with a little room for him to grow and still use. A little heavier than I was expecting. Came double boxed, so it's perfect for gifting. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: Nitro Golf Set Blaster Youth 6Piece Complete with Bag
product_meta.description: Nitro Blaster Youth golf set is right handed and great for ages 3-5 years old. Includes a driver and head-cover, 2 irons, one mallet Pro PUTTER. The lightweight sling golf bag makes it easy to carry and contain all your equipment. Constructed with graphite shafts for lightweight swinging. This set is perfect for the beginning golfer
